segments.text: I take in the kitchen view, angled just right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands at the sink, towel in hand, drying away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wait, is that water overflowing from the basin?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over like crazy, making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no clue, foot right in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is after the cookie jar, bold as can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool's legs are splayed out, ready to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in one hand, plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is all eyes on him, hand up for hers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so joyful in their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is neat, with bushes and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame the inside is heading for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I get why kids do this, but the risks are too much.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing leaves me uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR
